sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-table
    :data="tableData"
    style="width: 100%"
    max-height="8 50">
    <el-table-column
      fixed
      prop="ctime"
      label="日期"
      width="350">
    </el-table-column>
    <el-table-column
      prop="wname"
      label="项目名称"
      width="220">
    </el-table-column>
    <el-table-column
      prop="adminID"
      label="负责人"
      width="220">
    </el-table-column>
    <el-table-column
      prop="describe"
      label="简介"
      width="520">
    </el-table-column>
    <el-table-column
      fixed="right"
      label="操作"
      width="120">
      <template slot-scope="scope">
        <el-button
        @click.native.prevent="deleteRow(scope.$index, tableData)"
          type="text"
          size="small">
          进入
        </el-button>
      </template>
    </el-table-column>
  </el-table>
</template>

<script>
  import axios from 'axios'
  const restweburl = "http://192.168.10.167:8888/";
  export default {
    created() {
      alert("1");
    // if (this.$store.state.newsdatalist.length == 0) {
    //   //const that=this; //用that解决函数内部this指向问题
      axios.post(restweburl + "Wares", {})
        .then((res) => {
          // alert("已收取");
          // alert(res.data);
          this.tableData = res.data.data;
          // this.$store.state.newsdatalist = res.data;
        })
        .catch(function (error) {
          console.log(error);
        });
    // } else {
    //   this.tableData = this.$store.state.newsdatalist;
    // }
  },
    methods: {
      // deleteRow(index, rows) {
      //   rows.splice(index, 1);
      // }
    },
    data() {
      return {
        tableData: [
          {
            date:'2023-6-10',
            name:'CCN-DBMS',
            people:'111test',
            description:'一次尝试'
          },
          {
            date:'2023-6-10',
            name:'CCN-DBMS',
            people:'111test',
            description:'一次尝试'
          }
        ]
      }
    }
  }
</script>
